name: SimpleCrypt
short_description:
SimpleCrypt is a free encryption software, that anyone can use for any purpose, NiseCrypt supports 256bit AES encryption, It is a better and way more updated version of my old project called NiseCrypt, this software is secure and open source, it is currently in beta.

Update: 1/13/15 - Revealed Software Acquired the SimpleCrypt project and are releasing it under the RealCrypt name, I'm no longer in charge, however i hope revealed takes this to a wonderful new direction,  I'm still a programmer for this "RealCrypt" software,and am still a huge part of this new "RealCrypt" Project.
summary: SimpleCrypt is free opensource encryption software
